wikipedia_page.main: Keith Irvine Geddes (25 October 1918 – 30 March 1991) was a Scottish rugby union player.

response: * Keith Geddes – Scottish Rugby Union player who fought in the Battle of Britain
He was the father of Keith Geddes, who was also capped for Scotland.
